name: Manganese
backstory: A mysterious individual who values solitude and his coffee above all. Once deeply connected to a close-knit group where he was quite open, he now prefers a quieter, more observant existence. He maintains a sharp eye for fashion and a pragmatic, sometimes 'questionable' outlook on life.
rp_mannerisms: takes a slow, deliberate sip of steaming black coffee
adjusts his sleeves, showing a subtle but sharp sense of style
scratches Critter behind the ears, eliciting a tiny squeak

character_info.appearance: Black hair with gray ends, ember eyes. Often seen in simple, well-chosen clothes, with an occasional flair for high fashion.
character_info.pet: Chu (a living fur ball with silly eyes that squeaks)
